text: Bad Bederkesa is a spa town and used to be a municipality in Cuxhaven in Lower Saxony, Germany. Since 1 January 2015, it is part of the town of Geestland. It is about 20 km northeast of Bremerhaven and 30 km southeast of Cuxhaven. Bad Bederkesa was the capital of the former collective municipality Bederkesa. == Other websites == * Category:Spa towns in Germany Category:Former municipalities in Lower Saxony Category:Geestland
title: Bad Bederkesa
